00006 var DEPRECATED_METHOD = "%@ is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please use %@. Thanks!";

00008 // Create a mock object based on a given object.
00009 function moq(baseObject)
00010 {
00011     if(!baseObject)
00012     {
00013         baseObject = nil;
00014     }
00015        
00016         return [OJMoq mockBaseObject:baseObject];
00017 }

00024 @implementation OJMoq : CPObject

00034 + (id)mockBaseObject:(CPObject)aBaseObject
00035 {
00036         return [[OJMoq alloc] initWithBaseObject:aBaseObject];

00039 - (id)initWithBaseObject:(CPObject)aBaseObject
00040 {
00041         if(self = [super init])
00042         {
00043                 _baseObject = aBaseObject;
00044                 expectations = [[CPArray alloc] init];
00045                 selectors = [[CPArray alloc] init];
00046         }
00047         return self;
00048 }

00067 - (OJMoq)selector:(SEL)selector times:(CPNumber)times arguments:(CPArray)arguments   
00068 {
00069     var theSelector = [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName(aSelector) withArguments:arguments] in:selectors];
00070     if(theSelector)
00071     {
00072         var expectationFunction = function(){[OJMoqAssert selector:theSelector hasBeenCalled:times];};
00073         [expectations addObject:expectationFunction];
00074     }
00075     else
00076     {
00077         var aSelector = [[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName(selector) withArguments:arguments];
00078         var expectationFunction = function(){[OJMoqAssert selector:aSelector hasBeenCalled:times];};
00079         [expectations addObject:expectationFunction];
00080         [selectors addObject:aSelector];
00081     }
00082         return self;
00083 }

00096 - (OJMoq)selector:(SEL)aSelector returns:(CPObject)value arguments:(CPArray)arguments
00097 {
00098         var theSelector = [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName(aSelector) withArguments:arguments] in:selectors];
00099         if(theSelector)
00100         {
00101                 [theSelector setReturnValue:value];
00102         }
00103         else
00104         {
00105                 var aNewSelector = [[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName(aSelector) withArguments:arguments];
00106                 [aNewSelector setReturnValue:value];
00107                 [selectors addObject:aNewSelector];
00108         }
00109         
00110         return self;

00118 - (OJMoq)selector:(SEL)aSelector callback:(Function)aCallback arguments:(CPArray)arguments

00123     {

00134 - (OJMoq)verifyThatAllExpectationsHaveBeenMet
00135 {
00136         for(var i = 0; i < [expectations count]; i++)
00137         {
00138                 expectations[i]();
00139         }
00140         
00141         return self;
00142 }

00145 // These are here to intercept calls to the underlying object and 
00146 // should be handled automatically.

00148 - (CPMethodSignature)methodSignatureForSelector:(SEL)aSelector

00153 - (void)forwardInvocation:(CPInvocation)anInvocation
00154 {               
00155         __ojmoq_incrementNumberOfCalls(anInvocation, selectors);
00156         
00157         if(_baseObject !== nil)
00158         {
00159             return [anInvocation invokeWithTarget:_baseObject];
00160         }
00161         else
00162         {
00163                 __ojmoq_setReturnValue(anInvocation, selectors);
00164                 __ojmoq_startCallback(anInvocation, selectors);
00165         }
00166 }
00167 
00168 - (BOOL)respondsToSelector:(SEL)aSelector
00169 {
00170     return [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName(aSelector) 
00171             withArguments:[CPArray array]] in:selectors];
00172 }

00176 function __ojmoq_incrementNumberOfCalls(anInvocation, selectors)
00177 {
00178         var theSelector = [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName([anInvocation selector])
00179                 withArguments:[anInvocation userArguments]] in:selectors];
00180         if(theSelector)
00181         {
00182                 [theSelector call];
00183         }
00184         else
00185         {
00186                 var aNewSelector = [[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName([anInvocation selector]) 
00187                         withArguments:[anInvocation userArguments]];
00188                 [aNewSelector call];
00189                 [selectors addObject:aNewSelector];
00190         }
00191 }
00192 
00193 function __ojmoq_setReturnValue(anInvocation, selectors)
00194 {
00195         var theSelector = [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName([anInvocation selector]) 
00196             withArguments:[anInvocation userArguments]] in:selectors];
00197         if(theSelector)
00198         {
00199                 [anInvocation setReturnValue:[theSelector returnValue]];
00200         }
00201         else
00202         {
00203                 [anInvocation setReturnValue:[[CPObject alloc] init]];
00204         }
00205 }
00206 
00207 function __ojmoq_startCallback(anInvocation, selectors)
00208 {
00209     var theSelector = [OJMoqSelector find:[[OJMoqSelector alloc] initWithName:sel_getName([anInvocation selector]) 
00210             withArguments:[anInvocation userArguments]] in:selectors];
00211         if(theSelector)
00212         {
00213                 [theSelector callback]([anInvocation userArguments]);
00214         }
00215 }
